name: Document Title: CHK-003-Civil-Material delivery inspection-Precast Pits and RCPs
ITP Description: Material delivery inspection-Precast Pits and RCPs
ITP approved for use by: Victor Mira
Attach: Delivery Docket and packaging Slip
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Does the number of packages in the delivery match that listed on the freight list/packaging slip?
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Do the contents of the delivery match the freight list/packaging slip?
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Is the delivery accompanied by Precast items Birth Certificates?
○ Precast components are to be marked on the birth certificate.
○ Cast date and lot are to be marked on the birth certificate.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Is the condition of packaging acceptable.
○ Precast items are protected from damage during the transport
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: For each precast type delivered, check for the following:
1 - Identification markings match the Precast type
2 - Precast Pit fabricated as per drawings - inverts size.
3 - Precast Pit Fabricated as per drawings - Inverts position (Distance from the bottom and edges).
4 - Precast Pit Fabricated as per Drawings - Invers Position - Correct Wall (orientation).
6 - Precast Pits and RCPs - Inspect for Cracks.
7 - Precast Pits and RCPs - Inspect for Spalling/Damage to concrete surface.
8 - Precast Pits and RCPs - Inspect for Exposed Reinforcement.
9 - Precast Pits and RCPs - Inspect for correct Lifting mechanism.
11 - Precast Pits and RCPs - Inspect for other fabrication defects (specify on the following lines)
